column5: ....For all those who like to ice fish Valens or perhaps would like to check out this link.  Valens Ice Fishing Derby
Try and get junior to win you this:  Test your luck and skill for your chance to win great prizes.  Top Prize is $1800 HumminBird Fish Finder with with GPS antenna and barometric pressure sensor.
Thanks Spiel, That's just around the corner from my place.  I'll check it out for sure.  I've heard there is some good size pike in Valens, is it true?  Corn Nug
....Just a reminder it's this weekend for those interested.
